name: Bunnihilation (Strawboie)
description:
It's just your typical 1% meeting at the darkest part of the city. All the other rich guys are there too, but something seems odd... Someone smells like middle- to lower class income, find the snitch but be discrete about it.

BUNNIHILATION is a multiplayer game for at least 2 players.

Be a master of disguise, trick and unmask the other players before they find you...

Arrows/A+D to move, SPACE to jump on somebodys head (watch your Endurance-Bar). Click PLAY AND HOST to host a game or LIST SERVERS and then JOIN to join someone elses game. Also stay away from the electricity, that shit kills you!

Art and music by Boie Thomsen, programming by Moritz Fink and Boie Thomsen

Mobile version coming soon!!!
